channel.title: Interconnect Services on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Interconnect Services on 0x000216

item.title: Ethernet Connections To The World
item.description: The debut of the first Carrier Ethernet Exchange (CENX) and the participation of major carriers demonstrate Ethernet’s expansion beyond local networks to a global scale. CENX, the world’s first neutral exchange provider for Carrier Ethernet services, enables interconnection between carrier networks globally. This allows independent Ethernet carriers to access each other’s networks and customers, facilitating seamless voice, data, and video transmission. This concept of global connectivity mirrors the telegraph and telephone systems established over a century ago.
